src:
Wah, Skuat Arsenal Mulai Membangkang dari Unai Emery?
06 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah informasi beredar mengenai kondisi Arsenal saat ini. Sejumlah pemain Arsenal diberitakan mulai membangkang dari instruksi pelatih mereka, Unai Emery.
Beberapa pekan terakhir, Unai Emery memang tengah menjalani periode yang berat. Ia mendapatkan banyak kritikan setelah Arsenal meraih sejumlah hasil yang kurang maksimal.
Selain itu, Emery juga mendapatkan kritikan mengenai caranya menangani Arsenal. Ia dinilai tidak mengambil keputusan yang tepat untuk mengatasi situasi Granit Xhaka dan Mesut Ozil di skuat The Gunners.
The Mirror mengklaim bahwa situasi Emery ini semakin berat. Pasalnya sejumlah pemain mereka mulai membangkang dari sang pelatih.

Simak informasi selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Wow, the Arsenal squad is starting to rebel from Unai Emery?
Nov 6 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - An information circulating about the current condition of Arsenal. A number of Arsenal players reportedly began to defy from the instructions of their coach, Unai Emery.
The last few weeks, Unai Emery is indeed undergoing a difficult period. He received a lot of criticism after Arsenal won a number of results that were less than optimal.
In addition, Emery also received criticism about how to deal with Arsenal. He is considered not to take the right decision to overcome the situation of Granit Xhaka and Mesut Ozil in the Gunners squad.
The Mirror claims that Emery's situation is getting worse. Because a number of their players began to defy the coach.

Check out the complete information below.
